resources:
GraduateProject Test your Maths Select the math operation Additionstring> Subtractionstring> Multiplicationstring> Divisionstring> Get Score Go back Home Next Question Home Your Score : Score Report Question 1 Question 2 Question 3 Question 4 Question 5 Question Quotient Remainder Your Answer 	* This app is to help kids learn Basic Math Operations

 	* Operations Included :- 
 		1. Addition 
 		2. Subtraction 
 		3. Multiplication 
 		4. Division 
 	* User of app will be provided with 5 questions on each operation selected.
 	* Click Next button to go to next question.
 	* After 5 questions are answered, user can click on Score report.
 	* Score Report - It gives the user score Num correct questions / Total Questions 
 		and which questions were correctly answered and incorrectly answered.
 	* A Home Button is provided at to go back to main menu.

Maths Tutor App Help Maths Tutor
